chapters.title: Chapter 18:  The Strength of This Place
chapters.info: Lord Rajabi, p. 269—Lumbering lord of Arad Doman. He is bull-necked—his neck is as thick as a ten year-old ash, and his arms are almost as wide—with brown eyes, no hair, a bulbous chin, and a wide nose. He faintly resembles a large boulder. He is Dragonsworn, and as powerful among them as Shimron. He now serves as a commander in Rodel Ituralde's army. Ituralde describes him as being very determined. He was wounded in the fighting in Arad Doman—his left leg had to be amputated at the knee. We now walks on a peg. See also Ankaer; Wakeda.
